text:
@BrianKarem @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Trump doesn't even know what COVID-19 means. 

Trump thinks that disinfectant or "powerful" light can be injected into the body to kill SARS-CoV-2.

Trump thinks Finland is part of Russia.

Trump thinks windmills cause cancer.
